title: Client bugged out after game ends
body:
I've tried everything from uninstalling and reinstalling, disconnecting League out of my Steam's external game feature, and setting the client between closing during game and staying open during game but no matter what I do, in about 80-90% I'd say of my games ending, the League window comes up looking like this. 
https://i.gyazo.com/1d960376f19c8a7d346ff289b8a63eab.png

And when I try to close the window (also to prove this is the League window)
https://i.gyazo.com/67f0a01e5eac97023a5fc1388cdc0075.png

How do I fix this?

replies.body: Seems like some of the client files might be a little bugged out for some reason. Let's make sure that you're opening the client through the League shortcut and not through Steam anymore just in case. Also, shoot me a screenshot of that 'close client during game' option being turned off. I've had a few instances where people thought it was turned off, but were mistaken, so I just want to be 100% sure we're on the same page.

I posted the above after uninstalling/reinstalling, which removed it from my Steam and Steam shortcuts entirely, and was opened via the League shortcut on my desktop but it's still happening, even in the games I've played since my original post. I currently have it set to not close during game, and here's the screenshot of that.

https://i.gyazo.com/32675955d75ce42953a74c7b071b1564.png

I have also tried setting it to close during the game thinking that was the problem, but on both cases it still comes up like that sometimes.

Thanks for that! Typically the close client option has been the quick and easy fix for this kind of issue, but it sounds like we're dealing with something entirely different possibly. Let's get you in touch with the experts in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Our techs might ask you for some logs, so go ahead and grab the [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) so you can have those ready.
